item.title: Advance Wars
item.description: flowchart TD 1[1-3] 4A[4A-5A] 4M[4M-7M] 10F[10] 11F[11] 12[12-14] 15[15-18] 19[19-21] 19A[19-21] 19S[19-21] A[Unlock Grit] B[Unlock Sonja] C[Unlock Drake] D[Unlock Eagle] E[Unlock Kanbei] F[Unlock Nell] G[Unlock Sturm] X[Unlock all COs] Z[Advance Campaign Clear] 1 -->|Andy Branch| 4A 1 -->|Max Branch| 4M 4A --> 6A 6A -->|HQ Cap| 8 6A -->|Rout| 7A 4M --> A 7A --> 8 A --> 8 8 --> 9 9 --> 10 9 -->|Clear in 8 days or less| 10F 10 --> 11 10F --> 11 10F -->|Clear in 10 days or less| 11F 11 --> 15 11F --> 15 11F -->|Clear in 12 days or less| 12 12 --> B B --> 15 15 -->|Only use Andy| 19A 15 -->|Only use Sami| 19S 15 --> 19 19A --> C 19S --> 22 22 --> D 19 & C & D --> E X --> G G & Z --> F style A stroke:#69a2ff,stroke-width:3px style B stroke:#69a2ff,stroke-width:3px style C stroke:#69a2ff,stroke-width:3px style D stroke:#69a2ff,stroke-width:3px style E stroke:#69a2ff,stroke-width:3px style F stroke:#69a2ff,stroke-width:3px style G stroke:#69a2ff,stroke-width:3px style 7A stroke:#ff696e,stroke-width:3px style 12 stroke:#ff696e,stroke-width:3px style 22 stroke:#ff696e,stroke-width:3px
